effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user slams into the target using a full-force
blast of water. This may also lower the target’s
Defense stat.
